## Project title: Mental Health is Metabolic Health


- Metabolic interventions promote recovery at a systems-based level.

Aims – 
For patients:
To foster and support patient engagement in their own recovery

For clinicians:
To shift the focus from symptom-based treatment to system-based recovery.
